scripts.clean: npm run clean:root && npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server
scripts.install:client: cd ./client && echo 'Installing client packages...' && npm install
scripts.install:server: cd ./server && echo 'Installing server packages...' && npm install
scripts.latest: npm run latest:root && npm run latest:client && npm run latest:server
scripts.latest:client: cd ./client && echo 'Upgrading client packages to latest...' && npm --latest upgrade
scripts.latest:root: echo 'Upgrading root packages to latest...' && npm --latest upgrade
scripts.latest:server: cd ./server && echo 'Upgrading server packages to latest...' && npm --latest upgrade
scripts.postinstall: npm run install:client && npm run install:server && npm run install:mongo
scripts.update: git checkout master && git pull upstream master
